CustomField.description: Displays and icon depending on the journal status of the conversation note.
CustomField.formula: CASE(NKS_Journal_Status__c, 'Journal Completed', IMAGE('/logos/Standard/task/logo.svg', 'Journalført Ok', 20,20), 'Journal Error', IMAGE('/logos/Custom/Flag_Red/logo.png', 'Ikke journalført', 20, 20), IMAGE('/logos/Custom/Flag_Yellow/logo.png', 'Ikke journalført', 20, 20) )
CustomField.label: Journal Status
